issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: ORC Schema Evolution Issues (Vectorized, ACID, and Non-Vectorized)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Apply DDL restrictions for ORC schema evolution

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Always use Schema Evolution for ACID

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Backport to branch-1 HIVE-11981 ORC Schema Evolution Issues (Vectorized, ACID, and Non-Vectorized)

ATTACHMENT ID: 12781777 - PreCommit-HIVE-BRANCH_1-Build

No test failures are related.

Ready to go into branch-1 as soon as HIVE-12799 commits.

3 line Commit message needed:

{code}
Backport to branch-1 HIVE-11981 ORC Schema Evolution Issues (Vectorized, ACID, and Non-Vectorized)  (Matt McCline, reviewed by Prasanth J)
HIVE-12728: Apply DDL restrictions for ORC schema evolution (Prasanth Jayachandran reviewed by Matt McCline and Gunther Hagleitner)
HIVE-12799 Always use Schema Evolution for ACID (Matt McCline, reviewed by Sergey Shelukhin)
{code}

Doc note:  This adds *hive.exec.schema.evolution* with a default value of false in 1.3.0 and changes the parameter to true for ACID, which is not mentioned in the parameter description but should be documented in the wiki.  HIVE-12799 does the same for 2.1.0, and has a doc note that includes this commit to 1.3.0 (so this doc note is redundant).

* [Hive Configuration Properties -- Query and DDL Execution | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-QueryandDDLExecution]
* [Hive Transactions -- Configuration | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Hive+Transactions#HiveTransactions-Configuration]

*hive.exec.schema.evolution* was introduced in 2.0.0 by HIVE-11981 with a default value of true.
